article: angelina jolie adopted her daughter from ethiopia in 2005ethiopia has banned the adoption of children by foreigners amid concerns that children faced abuse and neglect abroad . ethiopia is one of the biggest source countries for international adoptions by us citizens , accounting for about 20 % of the total . celebrities brad pitt and angelina jolie are among those who have adopted children from ethiopia . in 2013 , a us couple were convicted of killing an adopted ethiopian girl . the bbc 's emmanuel igunza in ethiopia 's capital addis ababa says the case triggered a debate about foreign adoption .

two years ago , denmark also controversially stopped the adoption of children from ethiopia over what it said were concerns about possible human trafficking cases . lawmakers now say orphans and other vulnerable children should be cared for under locally available support mechanisms in order to protect them . but some mps said that the country has insufficient local services to cater for vulnerable children . ethiopia 's international adoptions in numbers : source : us department of state .
